page.title: 08Organisations in Guilsboro'
page.content: These are as follows; Women's Institute - meets on the 2nd Tuesday evening of the month and the 3rd Thursday afternoon. Junior cricket club- run by Mr.Wren Senior cricket club- Mr.J.Lowther Football Club;Fishing Club;Bowls club. Girl Guides- run by Mrs Tyler Brownies- run by Mrs Fowler/Mrs Barnes Church choir and Guilsborough Choral society,the latter having productions in March each year. Youth Club- run by Rev.Gibbs. Mother's Union(in combination with Hollowell parish) Saturday morning music school situated at the primary school.
